### Assignments {-}

For each chapter there is a home assignment. You can use the `Open Coding Space` for asking questions and for working on your assignments. You can help each other, but everyone has to submit an own home assignment.  

To participate in the assignments, you need a GitHub-Account and write your name and the name of your GitHub-Account into the following spreadsheet:</br>
[Spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15NhYz8sYSogZ23FAtZkxmVMc9b4WVtvm_typ-L2xOeQ/edit?usp=sharing)


**Grading:** 

* $1$ Point per correct assignment
* $0.5$ Point if at least $50\%$ of the assignment is correct. 
* $0$ Point otherwise

**Bonus for the exam grade:**

* Upgrade of two grade steps if at least $80\%$ of the maximal possible assignment points were collected.  
* Upgrade of one grade step if less than $80\%,$ but at least $60\%$ of the maximal possible points were collected.
